Message Based Settings:File Append Enable

Short name: File Append En

Requires: Base Development System

Classes: TCP/IP Socket, GPIB BoardInterface, TCP/IP Instr, Instr, VXI/GPIB-VXI MBD Instr, GPIB Instr, Serial Instr, VXI Servant

Specifies whether VISA Read To File appends or overwrites (truncates) when opening a file. If this property is set to TRUE, VISA Read To File appends when opening a file. If this property is set to FALSE, VISA Read To Fileï¿½overwrites (truncates) when opening a file. The default is FALSE.

Remarks

The following table lists the characteristics of this property.

Data type
Permissions Read/Write
